EmailTemplate.name: DF 16 ThankYou
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for visiting AutoRABIT at DF'16!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Visitor,
Thanks for visiting AutoRABIT’s booth at DF16. You’ve been entered into our raffle to win an iPhone 7. We appreciate the opportunity to introduce you to AutoRABIT and our Salesforce Continuous Delivery solution.
Don’t hesitate to contact us with questions, requests for pricing or product information.
If you want to learn more, reach us via email at info@autorabit.com or call us at 925-500-1004 ext. 111.
In the meantime, please read our datasheet, visit our website (autorabit.com) and our YouTube Channel.
